TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InterfaceQueuingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class InterfaceQueuingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class InterfaceQueuingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 为标记的接口启用队列支持。

span.span: Enables queuing support for the marked interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口上的调用将使用消息队列进行排队。Calls on this interface will be queued using Message Queuing. 若要将接口标记为已排队，请将此特性应用于使用以下语法的界面： `[InterfaceQueuing]`。To mark an interface as queued, apply this attribute to the interface using the following syntax: `[InterfaceQueuing]`. 排队的接口的成员方法必须满足的要求排队的方法调用，例如，没有`out`或`ref`参数。The member methods of a queued interface must fulfill the requirements for queued method calls, such as having no `out` or `ref` parameters. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`InterfaceQueuingAttribute`属性。The following code example shows how to use the `InterfaceQueuingAttribute` attribute. [!code-cpp[System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents/CPP/queuedcomponent.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents/CS/queuedcomponent.cs#2)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将 COM + 应用程序标记为在编译时使用排队`ApplicationQueuing`属性，并通过设置启用 COM + 侦听器`QueueListenerEnabled`为 trueThe following code example shows how to mark a COM+ application as queued at compile time by using the `ApplicationQueuing` attribute, and enable the COM+ listener by setting the `QueueListenerEnabled` to true [!code-cpp[System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents/CPP/queuedcomponent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents/CS/queuedcomponent.cs#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`BindToMoniker`运行排队的名字对象，以获取记录器的实例调用的方法，将记录，并强制记录器对象，以便将消息发送到队列的版本。The following code example shows how to use `BindToMoniker` to run the queued moniker, to get an instance of the recorder, call the method that will be recorded, and force the release of the recorder object, to send the message to the queue. [!code-cpp[System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents/CPP/queuedcomponentclientclass.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents/CS/queuedcomponentclientclass.cs#0)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并启用队列支持。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, enabling queuing support.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于`Queuing-Enabled`COM + 中的属性。This property corresponds to the `Queuing-Enabled` property in COM+.
